name: 社長
text: やはりここまで来ると、\n乗り越えるべき壁も高かったな……
trans: The wall to climb over after coming this far was tall...

name: はづき
text: 結果は残念でしたけど……\nおふたりは立派にやってましたよ！
trans:
The results are unfortunate, but...
The two of you did a splendid job!

name: はづき
text: ここまで来れただけでも、\n胸を張って誇れることだと私は思います
trans:
You were only able to come this far, but I think you
can walk with your heads held high.

name: 社長
text: ああ、良い活躍だった\nそれはたしかだ
trans: Yes, it was certainly a great effort.

name: プロデューサー
text: ……俺もそう思います\n彼女はよくやってくれました
trans:
...I think so, too.
She did a great job.

name: はづき
text: その言葉を、彼女に直接\n言ってあげましょう？
trans: How about you tell that to her in person?

name: プロデューサー
trans: The third round. We couldn't make it──

name: 透
text: 通過したらさ、\n何が……あるのかなって
trans:
If we'd passed,
something might've been... beyond it, maybe.

name: プロデューサー
text: いや、そりゃ……最後の審査が……
trans: Well, I mean... the final judging would've...

name: 透
text: ──……なんだろう\nわかってたつもりだったんだけど……
trans:
──...What was it?
It was like I was going to get what it all was, but then...

name: 透
text: わかんなくなったっていうか
trans: Like I ended up just not getting it, or something.

name: 透
trans:
...sorry.
What am I even saying anymore?
